class.name: HltSelRepRBExtraInfo
class.author: Tomasz Skwarnicki
class.desc: Manages the RawBank::HltSelReports Extra Info sub-bank. The first word contains number of objects stored (less significant short) and size of the sub-bank in words (more significant short). The rest consists of three sectors: number per object (8-bits), info-keys (16-bits) and floats (32-bits). The first two may be padded to start a new sector at a full word. Info can only be read and stored sequencially.

attribute.desc: Location of the subbank body in the program memory

attribute.name: infoLoc
attribute.desc: location of the first info word inside the bank

attribute.name: floatLoc
attribute.desc: location of the first float word inside the bank
